definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
tone of one's voice when asking a rhetorical question

sentences.english: The style was hurried, the tone intemperate .
sentences.chinese: 匆促的笔调，放纵的语气。

sentences.english: His tone can be alarmingly inconsequential, as if the reader is there to be perpetually wrong-footed.
sentences.chinese: 他的语气极其不合逻辑，好像读者永远都站不对阵脚。

sentences.english: In a way, the tone comes with the territory.
sentences.chinese: 在某种程度上，这种语气和范围有关。

sentences.english: The adverb of mood is of a sub-category in mod ern Chinese adverbial wo rds.
sentences.chinese: 语气副词是现代汉语副词的一个次类。

sentences.english: His peremptory tone of voice irritated everybody.
sentences.chinese: 他那专横的语气激怒了大家。

sentences.english: Change the shape and ring, and you change everything.
sentences.chinese: 改变句子的形式和语气，你会改变所有。

sentences.english: The student found it difficult to learn the subjunctive mood of English.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生发现英语的虚拟语气很难学。

sentences.english: Send to cup in hand Feng feather in front, the tone of the Yi breeze also joined heroism.
sentences.chinese: 将手中杯子送到凤羽面前，逸风的语气也添了豪气。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 A semantic and pragmatic analysis on the tone adverb Lian.
sentences.chinese: 语气副词“连”的语义和语用分析。

sentences.english: Ginder said. Make sure your tone of voice is not defensive.
As to the use of subjunctive mood, I'll deal with it in detail later.
sentences.chinese: 至于虚拟语气的用法，我以后再详细地讲。

sentences.english: Discuss your situation with humor and self-deprecation.
sentences.chinese: 用一种幽默和自嘲的语气来谈论你的状况。

sentences.english: Start by empathizing and end by advocating.
sentences.chinese: 开口语气要中肯强调，结束要拥护支持。

sentences.english: The basic function of the Cantonese final particles is assisting the intonation to convey moods.
sentences.chinese: 广州话句末语气助词的基本功能是辅助句调表达语气。

sentences.english: The basic function of the Cantonese final particles is assisting the intonation to convey moods.
sentences.chinese: 广州话句末语气助词的基本功能是辅助句调表达语气。

sentences.english: The paper deals with the function of modal particles in modal category.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论情态语气范畴中语气词的功能问题。

definition: tone of voice/connotation in intonation/accent (regional etc)/snout/muzzle/lips/protruding portion of an animal's face
tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
expression or emotion showing in one's eyes/meaningful glance/wink/eyesight (dialect)
tone of voice/the way one speaks/manner of expression/tone
